title: Blood of Ironside
description: Edgar Atheling, the proclaimed King of England, has been betrayed by his allies and his plans to win back the throne from William the Conqueror thwarted. The Normans have hunted him across the north of England, devastating the land in the process. Edgar is forced to return to the sanctuary of the court of King Malcolm of the Scots.Once there he is tempted to give up the fight. But the continuing flame of resistance persuades him to return to continue the fight, to ally himself with the King of the Danes and Hereward the Wake and stake all on a gamble to win back his birthright.William fights back and Edgar is forced to flee to Europe. Once there he discovers friends and enemies. But William remains determined to put an end to his resistance once and for all.
author: Martin Lake
